name: Easy Lemon Garlic Chicken
author: Ken Wehrheim
summary: Not a lot to say here--very few ingredients, not a lot of calories, and delicious.
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add chicken and cook until browned, about 4 minutes per side
Pour broth over chicken and cover skillet; lower heat to low and simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 30 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Transfer chicken to a plate, reserving broth mixture in the skillet
Pour lemon juice into broth mixture and simmer until liquid is reduced by 1/3, 2 to 3 minutes
Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes per side
